page.title: 08Welland - People
page.content: Apart from the pub and the village shop there are few opportunities for employment in Welland. Some people sell excess garden produce. Most people work in Malvern or Worcester and some{commute}as far as Birmingham or Bristol (the M5O is only 8 miles away). Many people on the new housing estates run 2 cars. Bus services are infrequent. A mobile library calls once a fortnight and a variety of{clubs and {societies}meet in the village hall. These include the Womens Institute, the Corderey (old peoples) Club, a youth club (the Young Wellies), Girl Guides and a play group. The recreation ground behind the hall provides faclities for football.
